fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 gained 61.70 points or 0.32% to settle at 19,632.55. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, fell 1.63% to 11.14. HDFC Bank, Reliance Industries and Bharat Forge were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The August 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 31 August 2023.
